entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
